thread.title: Joseph Davidson

author: Joseph Davidson
title: Joseph Davidson
text: My wife & I are taking a trip to Europe in April and or concerned we would not get our passports back in time using the conventional method. We saw an advertisement for "rush my passport" and decided to give it a try. From beginning to end, everyone was wonderful to work with in the process was very simple. Thank you Francois (Topaz) Topasna! Well worth the money!!
